import { callAPI } from './base'; // Get user's messages

export const getMyMessages = (params = '') => callAPI(`/messages/my/${params}`); // Get single message

export const getSingleMessage = id => callAPI(`/messages/${id}`); // Toggle message read

export const toggleMessageRead = id => callAPI(`/messages/${id}/toggle-read`, 'put'); // Remove message

export const removeMessage = id => callAPI(`/messages/${id}`, 'delete');
